response.overview: Queen of Thonnakkal helmed by Syam Muraleedharan revolves around a Panchayat election of Thonnakkal a village in Trivandrum Kerala. The storyline takes us to the aftermath of the reservation of seats for women in elections. Centering around the veteran politician and panchayat president Paulose Pazhukkapilly (Madhupal) and his daughter Jiji Paulose (Maria Vincent) who is a social media influencer the movie deals with the latterâ€™s entry into politics.
response.title: Queen Of Thonnakkal
